/* ArticleMapper.ListArticle */
SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID, A.ARTICLE_TITLE, A.ARTICLE_CONTENT, A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS ARTICLE_WRITER_NAME, CASE WHEN DATE(A.CREATE_DT) = DATE(SYSDATE()) THEN DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') END AS CREATE_DT FROM CO_ARTICLE A LEFT JOIN CO_BOARD B ON B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID LEFT JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = A.ARTICLE_WRITER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.BOARD_ID = @BoardId
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DT DESC
